dataSetInformation.common:synonyms: Coating composite equipment; Coating process,涂布液（溶剂型）
Coating composite equipment; Coating process,涂布液（溶剂型）
dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Coating equipment is mainly used for adhesive coating and composite processing of various roll substrates such as plastic film, paper, electrochemical aluminum, cloth and leather. It is widely used in various packaging fields and has a broad development prospect. Coating composite equipment is roughly divided into three types: light roller coating, net roller coating and hot melt adhesive extrusion coating. Coating technology is an important processing technology to change and improve the surface characteristics of materials. With the continuous development of science and technology, coating technology has become an indispensable important technical means for the research and development of many important functional materials.
涂层设备主要用于塑料膜、纸张、电化学铝、布料和皮革等各种卷材基材的粘合涂层和复合加工。它在各种包装领域中广泛使用，具有广阔的发展前景。涂层复合设备大致分为三种类型：光滚涂层、网滚涂层和热熔胶挤出涂层。涂层技术是改变和提高材料表面特性的重要加工技术。随着科学技术的不断发展，涂层技术已成为许多重要功能材料研发的不可或缺的重要技术手段。
